data.persona: I usually go to the park to watch my child play. I am a one and only child. I am my parent's favorite child.
data.description:
You are in the Corn field.
the corn field extends as far as the eye can see. In the off season months it is barren grass, but during the corn growing season it is filled with shoulder high thick yellow stocks with corn growing at the ends. There are pathways cut into the field to provide walking terrain for the farmers.
The farmers is here.

You are carrying a treat and a rope, wearing a shoe, a hats, a shirt, and a belt, and wielding an crystal ball.

data.short_motivation: I want to give a gift to the farmers
data.mid_motivation: I want the farmers to let me stay with them today
data.long_motivation: I plan to learn a little about farming in the coming weeks
